def_en: A stripe is a long line which is a different colour from the areas next to it.

def_cn: (军装或警服上表示等级或服役年限的 V 型)臂章
def_en: In the armed forces or the police, stripes are V-shaped bands of material sewn onto a uniform to indicate the rank of corporal or sergeant. In the United States, stripes can also show the length of time that a person has served in an organization.
